examples.example: 我的好朋友有个很可爱的昵称叫作小布丁。

translate.english: My good friend has a very cute nickname called Little Pudding.

examples.example: 我的小狗有个很有趣的名字叫作肉肉。

translate.english: My little dog has a very interesting name called Rou Rou.

examples.example: 我的猫咪有个很特别的名字叫作雪球。

translate.english: My cat has a very special name called Snowball.
